name: Basic World Conqueror
description:
Wolpertinger Games

Basic World Conqueror; We have developed the game in a total of 8 hours. We will continue to develop the game after this test version, which we put on the web for the first time...

Game Developer - Arda Dizman

Warning!

Please play the game in full screen mode with 1920x1080 otherwise it will be corrupted.
